translations: n.评价者；估价者；价格核定人

phrs.translation: 估价人, 评价者, 年估价师
土地经济师和估价师, 土地经济学家及估价师
浙江省土地估价师协会

sentences.sentence: Property valuers in Dubai who advised Banks that the market was overheating were ignored.
sentences.translation: 迪拜的房地产评估人对银行发出的市场过热的警告被忽视。

sentences.sentence: But until there is such an entity, it is up to the valuers to enhance the credibility of their reports.
sentences.translation: 但即使建立了这样的机构，它应该努力保证评估师所出具报告的可信赖度。

sentences.sentence: If you go two to three years back, auditors were not communicating with valuers until late in the valuation process.
sentences.translation: 如果回顾两至三年前，审计师并不和评估师沟通，直到最近的评估程序。
